publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5801 Colin Fox: Thanks to Parliament Staff—That the Parliament is pleased to join the Scottish Socialist Party parliamentary team in conveying sincere thanks to the people in the Parliament who work to make each of our lives easier: cleaners, catering staff, porters, security staff and police, mailroom staff, maintenance staff and all parliamentary workers, who remain courteous, friendly and hard-working. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-5801 Colin Fox: Thanks to Parliament Staff—That the Parliament is pleased to join the Scottish Socialist Party parliamentary team in conveying sincere thanks to the people in the Parliament who work to make each of our lives easier: cleaners, catering staff, porters, security staff and police, mailroom staff, maintenance staff and all parliamentary workers, who remain courteous, friendly and hard-working.

S2M-5801 Colin Fox: Thanks to Parliament Staff—That the Parliament is pleased to join the Scottish Socialist Party parliamentary team in conveying sincere thanks to the people in the Parliament who work to make each of our lives easier: cleaners, catering staff, porters, security staff and police, mailroom staff, maintenance staff and all parliamentary workers, who remain courteous, friendly and hard-working. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Rosie Kane*, Jackie Baillie*, Campbell Martin*, Dr Elaine Murray*, John Scott*, Mr David Davidson*, Ms Sandra White*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mike Pringle*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Margaret Mitchell*
